I'm usually hungover and looking for my next drink.
i love animals and i want to help them.

participant_2.background:
My most valued material possession is my journal, because it's a place where I can be honest with myself and explore my thoughts and feelings.
I created the mobile that hangs above my baby's crib.
i drive a black car.
i am a great cook.
I collect interesting stories from my neighborhood.

content.text: Hey there! I'm so sorry, I didn't mean to leave you hanging. I got a phone call from my mom and it ran long.
No worries! How are you doing this evening?
I'm doing well, thanks! My day was pretty good, actually. I spent the morning at the animal shelter, volunteering. I love animals and I want to help them in any way I can.
That's so great! I love animals too. I have a cat named Pickles. He's my best friend.
Aww, that's so sweet! I love cats. I used to have a cat named Mittens when I was a kid. I miss her.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure she was a great cat.
She was the best! She was always there for me, no matter what.
Sounds like you had a great cat.
I did. She was my best friend.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I love to cook. I'm not a professional chef, but I'm pretty good. I also like to exercise. I try to go to the gym at least three times a week.
That's great! I love to cook too. I'm not a professional chef either, but I'm pretty good. I also like to exercise. I try to go to the gym at least three times a week too.
That's awesome! It's so hard to find people who like to cook and exercise.
I know, right? It's like they're two totally different worlds.
Yeah, it's hard to find people who can do both.
Well, I'm glad we found each other.
